data.description:
2012 Tundra Dr, Burlington, NC 27217 is a single family home that contains 1,945 sq ft and was built in 2021. It contains 4 bedrooms and 2.5 bathrooms. This home last sold for $259,000 in October 2021. 
 
The Zestimate for this house is $310,000. The Rent Zestimate for this home is $1,832/mo.
